semantic_identifier: [GOLD-162]: Add segment-based impact slicing on issues/themes using Customer_Analyzer segment IDs
title: Add segment-based impact slicing on issues/themes using Customer_Analyzer segment IDs

sections.text: Implement backend aggregation to break down each issue/theme’s impacted customers by Customer_Analyzer segment_id (and include fit_tier where available) without introducing new ICP logic. Expose this breakdown via the Issue_Tracker API/DB fields so downstream UI/analytics can query it consistently. Ensure accounts with missing/unknown segment_id/fit_tier are grouped into an explicit “unknown” bucket and do not block overall impact calculations.
